"Hounyan": "...Wait. Your Class isn't Techter, is it?"
"If you want to learn how to fight, please go to the Class Counter and change your Class to Techter."
"Be sure to also learn some Techter Class Skills."
"Well, perhaps I should explain it a little first."
"Techter is a Class that excels in supporting its allies."
"Its Class Skills give you ways to increase your allies' offensive and defensive power."
"In essence, while no slouch in combat itself, it makes everyone around it more effective as well."

"As a beginner...
You may wish to get used to using \"Shifta-Deband\" first."
"I will assign you a training task. Use it to try out what I've taught you."
